    • BuyController

      public BuyController()

  • Method Details

    • buy

      public void buy()
      This method is called when the user, while he's on the board.fxml page clicks the buy button. It will just show a new stage in which the user will see all the cards he can buy.

    • select

      public void select​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method is called when the user clicks on a card. It will ask him all the info's needed for the buy move.
      Parameters:
      event - is the event caught when the user clicks on a card.

    • showDecks

      private void showDecks()
      This method shows the new Stage.

    • putInfo

      private void putInfo​(java.lang.String card)
      Utility method used for storing the information about the card the user clicked.
      Parameters:
      card - is a string representation of the card the user clicked.

    • askResource

      private java.lang.String askResource​(java.lang.String resource)
      Utility method used for displaying a Confirmation box asking the user where he would like to take the resource needed for buying the card from.
      Parameters:
      resource - is the resource needed for buying the card.
      Returns:
      a String which contains the source of the resource used for buying the card.

    • askInd

      private java.lang.String askInd()
      Utility method used for displaying a confirmation box which will ask the user the slot in which he wants to place the card.
      Returns:
      a String which represents the slot.

    • updateDecks

      public void updateDecks()
      This method updates the available decks after each buy move.

    • setGui

      Description copied from class: GUIController
      Method used to set the gui for each type of Controller
      Specified by:
      setGui in class GUIController
      Parameters:
      gui - the gui to be set
